item.title: [GRA6][Virtual Private Servers] - Virtual Private Servers incident notification
item.description:
Dec 19, 15:06 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our Virtual Private Servers offer in GRA6, please be aware that this is currently affecting the availability. Please find the details :

Start time : 19/12/2024 14:40 UTC
Service impact : Some Virtual Private Servers in GRA6 might be unavailable or have latency due to a storage issue.
Ongoing action : Our teams are fully mobilized and actively working to resolve the problem.

We will keep you updated on any developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [CA/APAC][Bare Metal] - server lifecycle processes incident notification
item.description:
Dec 19, 04:36 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 19/12/2024 02:24 UTC
End Time : 19/12/2024 04:16 UTC
Service impact : The server lifecycle processes, including reopening, suspension, and deletion of dedicated servers, were slowed down.
We are pleased to inform you that the issue has been resolved, and all services have returned to normal.
Root cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

item.title: [RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 24B20
item.description:
Dec 18, 21:11 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 18/12/2024 19:05 UTC
End Time : 18/12/2024 21:09 UTC
Service impact :We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.
Root cause : Cooling module issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Dec 18, 19:09 UTC
Identified - An incident is in progress on our Bare Metal offer. It has temporarily affected the availability.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 18/12/2024 19:05 UTC
Service impact : A significant number of servers in the rack 24B20 are no longer responding.
Root cause : Cooling module issue.
Ongoing actions : Our teams is working to fix the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Our teams are fully mobilized and actively working to resolve this problem.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [SBG3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack S323A03 / S345B07
item.description:
Dec 16, 10:43 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
All services are operational. There has been no impact since 16/12/2024 10:36 UTC.

Dec 16, 08:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 27, 09:53 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 16/12/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 16/12/2024 11:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in rack S323A03 / S345B07 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will move servers from rack S323A03 to S322A06 and S345B07 to S345B08.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [BHS7][Dedicated servers] - Rack B714B10
